title: Healthier Grilled Cheese Sandwich
preparation: Layer cheese, tomato and spinach between the bread slices.
Heat a large, heavy skillet over medium-low heat. Lightly spray the bottom with cooking oil.

Add sandwich and cook until browned on the bottom, about 4-5 minutes. Flip the sandwich over, cover the skillet and continue to cook until the other side is browned and cheese has melted, about 4-5 minutes more.
Cut sandwiches in half and serve hot.
